Key Match Events: The Athletics won the game in 12 innings with a score of 4-3.
The Athletics laid down four bunts in the game, including three consecutive bunts in the top of the 12th inning.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Athletics' small-ball approach was effective.
Houston's defense was less than stellar.
Others: The game was played at Minute Maid Park.
Mark Kotsay, the Athletics' manager, noted the effectiveness of the bunting strategy.
